attributes.action: Give Essential & Non-essential retail workers at least 2 days off for Christmas
attributes.additional_details:
Essential & Non essential retail workers deserve to have at least 2 days off for Christmas to spend with their families after this awful year of events spending time wih their families at Christmas is more important that ever. 
    Retail workers have worked extra hard this year during the Pandemic to keep the economy going.
attributes.background: After the awful year of events that have happened and the hard work of all the retail workers who have kept our economy running. i petition that companies allow their retail workers at least 2 days off for christmas to spend with their families in their respective household bubbles.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for employers, but you might like to sign this petition calling for all stores to be closed

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562108
